entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2.
